column5: Saw it on the news where they both went through Sturgeon Lake in the Kawarthas last evening with one person rescued and one still missing so if your out on the lakes today boys just be careful where you go.
Toronto Star story here https://www.thestar.com/news/gta/2018/01/20/one-missing-another-in-hospital-after-falling-through-ice-on-sturgeon-lake.html Kawartha Kev
Just saw it on the news...  Glad they got one guy out.
Looks like real close to Bobcaygeon
The other was Found Dead, RIP: https://www.cp24.com/news/missing-snowmobiler-found-dead-near-bobcaygeon-1.3769302

I am in shock right now  .... just learned that the guy that died is my neighbor , I've known him for many years ... I just can't believe it .....  very very sad ...... my sincere condolences to his wife and 3 boys  and extended family .......
Condolences, lost a family member on that lake in '89 I'm always nervous when on lakes in the area.
So sad. My son lives in Bobcaygeon and every time I hear about a snowmobiler going through the ice I get shivers thinking my snowmobiling crazy son is the one. Condolences to the family.
